scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises oversized letters written to John Wesley Hunt from his business partner, Harry Heth, about struggles with their new business in Richmond, Virginia, as well as letters from Hunt's family back home in Trenton, Pennsylvania. Letters from Hunt's parents and siblings discuss his business, family news, and updates on the yellow fever and subsequent deaths sweeping Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Copies of these letters are stored in Box 1, Folder 3 along with other materials from 1793.
